bug.author: guhur
bug.description: I don't know exactly how, but labelme get closed when I type 'Ctrl-E' sometimes. I then get the error: <denchmark-code>(py36) Î» labelme --epsilon 2 Traceback (most recent call last): File "c:\users\pierr\src\labelme\labelme\app.py", line 820, in editLabel text = self.labelDialog.popUp(item.text()) AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'text' </denchmark-code>
